transcript: I want to make some money. I need to make some money. I got to pay bills. I owe people money. A lot of people money. I need to make some money.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I want to make some money.  I need to make some money.  I've got to pay some bills, I owe people money.  I owe lots of people money.  I need to make some money.
